pros: Great for a student who wants to become well rounded in the field. I loved the staff and the family oriented environment that it offered to patients as well as staff.

review_title: Wonderful place to work with a great mission.
pros: Fellow coworkers, atmosphere corporate but friendly, allowed to do my job with appropriate amount of supervision. Immediate supervisor wonderful.
cons: Budget tight working under grants as a foundation - sort of hamstrings the vision - the nature of the beast. So you learn to make-do.

pros: You aid those who need it most.
cons: The corporate management looks at the population and employees as nothing short of tools and dollar signs. They don’t care about their employees or patients to say the least.
